Note: Signed "A.K.S." Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Visa. 15.749" appears on the middle bottom of the poster. "Sketched on spot by Y.M.C.A. secy" -- Bottom left of illustration. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French and English says Verdun is on the road to the Y.M.C.A. Illustration shows a sketch of buildings and roads.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
